articles.title: Robert Morse, Mad Men Actor, Dies At 90 - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: The award-winning stage star found renewed fame in his later years on AMC's Mad Men.
articles.content: "I was so happy because a person of my age doesn't work much anymore," Morse told a Paley Center panel in 2009, expressing his joy to be cast in the show. "I was very grateful that I had this opportu… [+1866 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Lightyear trailer sends Buzz to the future where he meets Taika Waititi - Polygon
articles.description: Pixar’s new Lightyear trailer gives Buzz — based on the Toy STory character — some new friends, voiced by Taika Waititi and Keke Palmer, while Buzz himself is played by Chris Evans. Lightyear is set for release on June 17.
articles.content: Buzz meets some new friends, including one voiced by Taika Waititi
